channel.title: Colorectal Cancer on XU LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Colorectal Cancer on XU LAB

item.title: New breakthroughs
item.description: A team of Chinese, Japanese and Korean researchers led by Professor Xu Ruihua of Sun Yat-sen University’s Cancer Hospital conducted a large-scale, multi-center, phase III clinical trial of patients with advanced colorectal cancer after failed first-line treatment, AXEPT Research (Study No. NCT01996306) Objective To investigate the efficacy and tolerance of the modified double-drug combination scheme ( capecitabine+ irinotecan, XELIRI for short).
